column3: The sky is clear. There is no threat of precipitation.
Clouds feather the sky. There is no threat of precipitation.
Clouds tower in the otherwise clear sky. There is no threat of precipitation.
The sky is dark. Precipitation is likely.
The sky is overcast and gray. There is light and intermittent precipitation.
The sky is overcast and gray. There is light but steady precipitation.
The sky is dark. There is strong and steady precipitation.
The sky is dark and angry. There is strong and steady precipitation.
The sky is dark and angry. The precipitation is torrential.
